thread.title: Cookbook author to sign books, share samples of her dishes in Cicero
thread.title_full: Cookbook author to sign books, share samples of her dishes in Cicero | syracuse.com

author: Melinda Johnson | mjohnson@syracuse.com
title: Cookbook author to sign books, share samples of her dishes in Cicero
text:
SYRACUSE, N.Y. â€“ Yvona Fast will sign copies of her cookbook and offer samples of some of her dishes from noon to 4 p.m. Oct. 17 at Green Planet Grocery, 6195 Route 31, Cicero. Her cookbook is titled "Garden Gourmet: Fresh & Fabulous Meals From Your North Country Garden, CSA or Farmers' Market," (Bloated Toe Publishing, $24.95). The cookbook features seasonal recipes of fruits and vegetables grown in the region.
Fast writes a food column, North Country Kitchen , for the Adirondack Daily Enterprise and Lake Placid News. She graduated from Jamesville DeWitt High School and received her bachelor's degree from State University College at Oswego and master's degree from State University College at Geneseo.
